description.english: So the sun set on the Mammoth.
description.german: So versank die Sonne für das Mammuth.
description.french: Alors le soleil se coucha sur le Mammouth.
description.italian: Così il sole tramontò sul Mammut.
description.spanish: Entonces el sol se puso en la Mamut.
description.schinese: 就这样，阳光洒向猛犸象庞大的身躯。
description.thai: และแล้วตะวันก็ลับขอบฟ้าไปจากแม่ช้าง
description.japanese: こうしてマンモスの上に陽が沈み
description.danish: Så satte solen på på Mammutten.
description.turkish: Böylece Mamut bir daha gün yüzü göremedi.
description.arabic: و هكذا غربت الشمس على الماموث
description.brazilian: Pôs-se o sol sobre o Mamute.
description.bulgarian: Така че слънцето изгря над мамута.
